Member Function Documentation

def src.ros_node_base.RosNodeBase._check_config (   self,
  node_id,
  mandatory = [],
  recommended = [] 
)
private

Checks the config values from rosparam.

If recommended elements are mising, shows a warning. If mandatory elements are missing, shows an error end exits the program. Some params are none of these, they already have default values that are acceptable.

  msg,

)
private

Formats a log message.

Parameters
typeThe type of the message. Possibilities: ('e', 'w', 'i'). Others are treated as errors.
msgThe message to be printed.
node_idThe name of the node
